Conversation

User: Help me deploy my site on Netlify without Vite.
Assistant: Guided on deploying the site without Vite and resolving Netlify build issues.

Assistant: Provided code and instructions to add a functional search bar to the site.
User: Why do vocals have an AI smudge, and how do I remove it?
Assistant: Explained how to remove AI smudge from vocals using RX 11, Neutron, and Neoverb.

Assistant: Suggested atmospheric soundscapes from Producer Loops.
